sentences.en: But underneath the humour is an edge of bitterness.
sentences.cn: 但是幽默的背后却透着怨气。

sentences.en: Check the actual construction of the chair by looking underneath.
sentences.cn: 看看椅子的下面，检查一下它的实际构造。

sentences.en: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
sentences.cn: 他下车往底下看了看。

sentences.en: He has on a denim shirt with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一件牛仔衬衫,里面套了件T恤.

sentences.en: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.cn: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.en: He was as violent as Nick underneath.
sentences.cn: 在内心深处，他和尼克一样暴躁不安。

sentences.en: Her blonde hair was hidden underneath a baseball cap.
sentences.cn: 一顶棒球帽裹住了她的满头金发。

sentences.en: His bare feet were smooth on top and rough-skinned underneath.
sentences.cn: 他赤裸的双脚脚面很光滑，脚底却很粗糙。

sentences.en: It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.cn: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.en: Joe forced a smile, but underneath he was a little disturbed.
sentences.cn: 乔强颜欢笑，但内心里感到有些不安。

sentences.en: Now I know what the underneath of a car looks like.
sentences.cn: 现在我知道汽车的底部是什么样子了。

sentences.en: She was wearing a smart jacket with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.cn: 她穿了件时髦的夹克，里面是一件 T 恤衫。

sentences.en: Some objects had got entangled with the underneath mechanism of the engine.
sentences.cn: 一些东西缠在了发动机下面的机件上。

sentences.en: The coin rolled underneath the piano.
sentences.cn: 硬币滚到了钢琴底下。

sentences.en: The sand martin is a brown bird with white underneath.
sentences.cn: 崖沙燕是一种褐羽白腹的鸟。

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

sentences.en: The space underneath could be used as a storage area.
sentences.cn: 底下的空间可用作储藏区。

sentences.en: This jacket's too big, even with a sweater underneath.
sentences.cn: 即使里面穿一件毛衣，这件外套也太大了。

sentences.en: Underneath his outgoing behaviour Luke was shy.
sentences.cn: 在外向活泼的外表下，卢克其实很害羞。

sentences.en: Underneath I think he's actually a rather nasty piece of work.
sentences.cn: 内心里我觉得他是个非常讨厌的家伙.

sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

trans.tran_cn: 在下面，在底下，在下面，在下层

trans.tran_en: the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

trans.tran_cn: 在…之下，在下面，在…下面，在…领导或控制下
trans.tran_en: directly under another object or covered by it
directly under another object or covered by it
directly under another object or covered by it
